Pre-Game Insights: The Royals are trying to turn around their current funk, focusing on getting guys on base and going back to basics.
There is no panic in the clubhouse, according to Jaylon Thompson.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Vinnie Pasquantino expects to have thumb surgery today.
Yuli Gurriel has a mild hamstring strain and may miss time.
David Lesky reacts to the newest pickups, including Tommy Pham, who has an elite chase rate and good offensive profile.
Others: The White Sox lost their 20th straight game with Chris Flexen starting.
Bobby Witt Jr. and Michael Wacha were named Royals Player and Pitcher of the Month for August.
